settings.text:
We’re 437 — a luxe swim and activewear brand driven by a desire to create product that doesn’t compromise on style, quality, or fit.

Founded in 2017 by best friends Hyla Nayeri and Adrien Bettio, we’ve been expanding our product offering which started with swimwear but now includes activewear, beachwear, and accessories. In the last 4 years since launch, we’ve built a strong, loyal community that has helped us grow 5x year over year.

437’s iconic styles have now been worn by everyone you follow on Instagram — from Kylie Jenner, Megan Thee Stallion, Jennifer Lopez, and Addison Rae.

We’re 437 — a luxe swim and activewear brand driven by a desire to create product that doesn’t compromise on style, quality, or fit.

Founded in 2017 by best friends Hyla Nayeri and Adrien Bettio, we’ve been expanding our product offering which started with swimwear but now includes activewear, beachwear, and accessories. In the last 4 years since launch, we’ve built a strong, loyal community that has helped us grow 5x year over year.

437’s iconic styles have now been worn by everyone you follow on Instagram — from Kylie Jenner, Megan Thee Stallion, Jennifer Lopez, and Addison Rae.

Hyla Nayeri and Adrien Bettio co-founded 437 at only 21 years old. What started as a dream between two university students grew to a powerhouse brand, entirely self-funded and powered by a female team.

Their unique approach to running a business (and juggling friendship and work) has helped them grow into aspirational role models for both their team and other young women to pursue ambitious goals.

In 2021, Hyla & Adrien landed on the Forbes 30 Under 30 list, plus launched their mentorship course – How TF Do I Start -- to help other budding entrepreneurs build their empires.

Best friends Hyla Nayeri and Adrien Bettio launched 437 after a summer of travelling across the Amalfi Coast and indulging in everything their hearts desired.

The one issue they faced: finding swimwear that could keep up with their craving for adventure and carbs. The two set out to design a bikini that would accentuate their waist, elongate their legs and never stop them from grabbing that second serving of spaghetti bolognese.

They launched the brand in the summer of 2017 out of the townhouse they lived in during their last year of university, 437 Johnson St.
